com.threecrickets.prudence.cache
Class HazelcastMongoDbMapStore<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  com.threecrickets.prudence.cache.HazelcastMongoDbMapStore<K,V>
Type Parameters:
K - Key
V - Value
All Implemented Interfaces:
MapLoader<K,V>, MapStore<K,V>
Direct Known Subclasses:
HazelcastCacheMongoDbMapStore, HazelcastCacheTagsMongoDbMapStore
public abstract class HazelcastMongoDbMapStore<K,V>
extends Object
implements MapStore<K,V>

A Hazelcast persistence implementation over MongoDB.

The MongoDB connection must be stored as "mongoDb.defaultConnection" in the Component's context.

The MongoDB database will be "prudence".

Author:
Tal Liron
